description: This colourful goats cheese log has the ideal mix of sweet and savoury, delicious served with slices of pear and crackers.
name: Goats Cheese, Pistachio & Dried Cranberry Log Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 tbs pistachio nuts, shelled and chopped finely

recipeInstructions.text: Place the goats cheese and lemon zest in a bowl and mix well. Spoon on to a sheet of foil and shape into a thick log. Wrap in foil and place in the fridge to firm up for 20 minutes.
Spread the dried cranberries, rosemary and pistachios out on a large plate, remove the goats cheese from the fridge and peel off the foil.
Roll the goats cheese log in the dried fruit and nut mix to coat.
Serve with thinly sliced pears and wholemeal crackers of your choice.
